section_two_about_us_picture_one_text: Do the things you love with like-minded people.
section_two_about_us_picture_two_text: Get the social and physical boost you need! Hang out with like-minded people and build new connections to uplift your mood.
section_two_about_us_picture_three_text: Nurture your passions, explore interests, and craft connections to spark new adventures and create memories.
section_three_download_the_app: Do you want to… create new opportunities and build new relations? Download the app and join
section_four_how_it_works_print_screen_o: Download Papai on your phone to start. The app is free
section_four_how_it_works_print_screen_t: Explore activities on the map and request to join
Create activities you want to do with others
section_four_how_it_works_print_screen_f: Approve requests, invite people to join your activity…
section_five_why_papai_text: Because is there anything more fabulous than discovering new people who want to do the same things as you, with you?  By joining Papai, you get to connect with people through shared interests and activities, meet offline and do things together.
section_bottom_contacts_terms_of_use_and: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
